html:
12.13.24  9:05 am   if you were to choose three notes to play one after another, what would those notes be, and how would that sound like?  thanks

      i would do it a lot of different ways at different times. check out my music for a lot of examples of how i use notes

12.13.24  6:29 am   Can you bring me a glass of water?

      sure

12.13.24  5:23 am   what's something you used to lie about that you're now honest about? to yourself, even

      my lies have remained very consistent, and truthful as well

12.13.24  1:52 am   how to lock in with the drums as a bassist

      just spend a lot of time playing together while also loving each other at least on a musical level in that moment

12.13.24  1:27 am   what do you think about the book 'the life of pi'

      it reminds me of that john belushi poster everyone used to have

12.13.24  12:29 am   a

      i understand

12.12.24  11:29 pm   How to shake off a fear of general incompetence 

      might as well just get to work

12.12.24  10:27 pm   what is the reason for our existences?

      to see how many reasons you can find

12.12.24  9:50 pm   What is 2+2?

      the square root of [5 squared minus 3 squared]. ..... to the 0th power.... times [2 plus 2]

12.12.24  7:57 pm   i'm an EVIL inventor. i'm gonna invent an evil oven that makes food cold instead of hot. what are you gonna do about it?

      call it a freezer which has already been invented

12.12.24  5:47 pm   are there any letters whose shape you feel doesnt match the sound it makes?

      sure. the 'b' in 'doubt'

12.12.24  5:40 pm   How many sticks of butter do you own?

      i only rent butter

12.12.24  5:32 pm   im going to college soon . should i pursue a degree that makes me happy, or a  degree that opens up job opportunities?

      i honestly don't know what a 'degree' is, but to be honest it sounds kinda shady. on second thought maybe i'm just jealous

12.12.24  4:09 pm   Can I see a picture of any of your gaming stats in any game please 

      it's always a tie

12.12.24  2:59 pm   how many questions can be asked until we run out of questions to ask?

      i can think of at least 2 more

12.12.24  2:15 pm   Have you ever found anything music-wise that's impossible to replicate?

      sure

12.12.24  1:58 pm   what's a word that can be produced by adding a total of 3 letters to any part of the word "series"?

      fisheries

12.12.24  12:54 pm   where do babies come from

      that depends whether you are a democrat or a republican

12.12.24  12:12 pm   are you a gamer?

      hear me out ......... everyone is gamers

12.12.24  12:05 pm   How's it going?

      pretty good

12.12.24  11:45 am   Do you have to rescue all the thoughts in your head or do you have to let some die out?

      some of them leave and come back

12.12.24  9:29 am   How would you make a strawberry pi ?

      basically you just make a circle that is 'strawberry' wide in diameter. the distance around the edge will be of course strawberry pi

12.12.24  8:42 am   can you give me percentage of realness in this specific answer vs. all answers in general?

      all the answers are 100% real in the sense that i genuinely chose what i wanted to put in response

12.12.24  8:16 am   Have you ever used a middle-case letter?

      i believe so

12.12.24  6:06 am   is two friends on a beach a seqeul to hi im steve

      i'm pretty sure the sequel to hi i'm steve is soap tips. 2 friends on the beach is a follow-up to something much longer i've written that's probably not feasible to produce

12.12.24  5:54 am   hey bill, how long ago have you started writing/experimenting/or doing anything that is somehow involved with the production of music? (not including listening tho)

      longer ago than i can remember

12.12.24  2:49 am   how would you feel living in antarctica?

      i'm not sure

12.12.24  1:38 am   how to memorize a five minute speech in a day and a half

      i'm not sure

12.12.24  1:02 am   do you know any interesting palindromes or semordnilaps?

      i know a palindrome which can be used as a tool for putting a pair of semordnilaps together into a palindrome: "... sides reversed is ..."

12.12.24  12:48 am   Are you pansexual? Because In if the world doesn't end at 0:43 the lines that are being drew look like the pansexual flag.

      in that case, given how many colors i've used, and how few colors it takes to make a flag (usually just 2 or 3), you could find hundreds of different flags if you wanted to. the ones you'll find would be the ones you're most familiar with

12.11.24  11:49 pm   Why do turtles have shells

      the answer is inside the shell

12.11.24  11:30 pm   WHAT'S YOUR POWER MOVE?

      i can tell the difference between Ryan Gosling and Ryan Reynolds

12.11.24  10:24 pm   what's a reasonable amount of keyboards to use?

      almost any amount is reasonable

12.11.24  7:24 pm   what do you think of CMaj7sus2? it has to be the most majestic chord ever in my opinion

      it's pretty nice

12.11.24  5:12 pm   How did you come up with the picture titled "2 friends on the beach" in your video of the same name? Cold hard common sense?

      i got jealous of other writers who write for 2 characters. up until that point, most of my writing had been for 1 character. so i just wanted to have 2 characters talking to each other. so how about on a beach

12.11.24  4:12 pm   has this questions page ever inspired or influenced one of your songs or videos

      extremely rarely

12.11.24  3:41 pm   How much damage do you think you could cause with full access to an orchestra?

      an orchestra sounds like a hinderance, at least in the modern sense of the word which is ironically very traditional

12.11.24  3:35 pm   how much writing do you think youve done. both music and english

      i will assume you would like to know in terms of 'heaps', and the answer is several heaps. ok i just realized that won't mean anything to you unless you know how big the heaps are. so i'll mention, the heaps are sizeable

12.11.24  1:27 pm   what albums you been listening to lately?

      i don't listen to albums but that doesn't mean they aren't good

12.11.24  1:09 pm   what is a fun snack?

      how about .... leaves or something

12.11.24  12:58 pm   How do you come up with all of these amazingly unique lyrics for your songs?

      basically i'm just trying to demonstrate what's possible

12.11.24  12:32 pm   can we switch wednesday and thursday, but just once

      no

12.11.24  12:22 pm   Did you deadass take a picture of your floor just for 12.10.24  10:41 pm ?

      that picture is from full on deadass 2020, factually speaking

12.11.24  12:08 pm   do you enjoy when the warm wind blows, and billows in your clothes?

      when you put it that way, i'm distracted by the rhymes and some of the odd vocabulary you used

12.11.24  11:16 am   can your tips for language learning be applied to learning musical improv (listen to a recording of improv, find/create a transcript, don't expect to memorize it, spend a lot of time)?

      you misinterpreted the tip slightly. need many many many many many recordings on a continuing basis. that's for language. ok but so the difference with music is, you can actually learn precisely what all the 'words' or 'notes' mean all by yourself. music is different from spoken languages in that it's direct-to-soul. you don't have to know that 'shoe' means 'shoe' or anything. so you need less exposure to other people's work. you'll want some, but not the excrutiatingly high amount that you'd need for spoken languages

12.11.24  9:48 am   why did the chicken cross the road?

      because the walk signal was green

12.11.24  9:04 am   my teacher says learning a new instrument can make you better at the previous instrument. do you agree

      yes

12.11.24  8:40 am   what does two plus two equal

      100 divided by 25

12.11.24  8:26 am   if every person who told you that you saved their life was tallied, how many lives do you think you would have saved? 

      i'm not sure

12.11.24  8:16 am   Have you used a capital letter

      have you ever watched my content with your eyes open
